In Shanghai, we organized a series of Earth Day activities, calling on employees to care for the earth. 
Over 850 colleagues signed up for the event and more than 1,000 family members joined them. The 
staff at AMD Shanghai R&D center participated in various environmental activities, such as garbage 
cleaning and sorting, waste utilization, low -carbon travel, home greening, environmental science 
popularization, clothing recycling and community assistance.
